channel.title: go on Sting's Note
channel.description: Recent content in go on Sting's Note

item.title: Give golang a try
item.description: “Go is such a refreshing language to program in, there is very little clutter just the stuff you need to get the job done” – Matt West Background I’ve bean using java and python for years. With spring boot, it is easy to start an application. However, I still don’t like the database access part of java. Now JPA and mybatis are popular solutions for database access. When I need to write some queries with dynamic conditions, the code is still ugly.
